title: Pendant with a Centaur
medium: baroque pearl; gold enameled in black, white, pale blue, translucent red, green, and blue; 2 emeralds, 2 rubies, 1 piece of rock crystal or glass, 4 hanging pearls, 10 small pearls in the chain
dimensions: overall (with chain): 13.1 x 5.5 x 2.1 cm (5 3/16 x 2 3/16 x 13/16 in.)
